name: jhunt
text: You just can't resist sour cream.  It turns a regular taco into a supreme.

name: jrpigman
text:
If condiments are the cost of being lean,
you keep you dang figures, I'll burst out of my jeans.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
excellent, with your avatar and everything

a chubby

name: decagon
text: DJ luckypyjamas got a little chubby that year.

name: farqussus
text: Thanks Pam Ayres! How's the contract with Woman's Weekly?

name: wittyname
text: Pigman would rather be eating food.

name: belgand
text: A comment left by belgand was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by jhunt, mashisoyo, Wozzeck, usversusthem)

name: primal_in_the_mane
text: dj rae...

name: magb
text: Ray got served by his own mom -- the ultimate humiliation.

name: finish_him
text: "Raymond, sweetie, wake up... Time for school!  We'll be taking the car of pain this morning."

name: mystkmanat
text: BAM.

name: ssddr
text: Sour cream didn't invent itself, it was an invention handed down by god himself to teach us the lesson of loosing up and eating food thats beyond its prime.

name: phthoggos
text: Love the "isself" and the framing on the last panel.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by the_doz, gbeaton, gkiyo)

name: connellingus
text: If I'm not mistaken, here we have the first appearance of the jacket Ray wears solely for using the phone.

name: evolume
text: GUAC

name: stuart
text: In the end, he just settles on "Prime Time Productions".

name: dasilodavi
text: Sassy

name: satellitetv
text: I didn't like the alt text around this time.

name: surelysmack
text: i just didn't GET the alt text this time around

name: scottmcj
text: This has to be one of my favorite strips -- "it invented isself" is one of those lines that bubbles up in my consciousness every random few weeks and gives me a giggle.

name: highpitch_83
text: 5... I freakin LOVE sour cream

name: flim
text: Don't get your drink on and then call your mom, Ray. It never turns out like you think.

name: undyingsong
text: Huh. Not too sure why this more elderly, informative comment lacks chubbies. Whatever, it has at least one now.

name: butta
text: I have had this conversation many times with my own mother :(

name: boredom_man
text:
it is ok, butta

she is not here

you can take the bag off your head

name: k-work
text: it gets better as it goes on. i don't like the first half too much.

name: johnnybaverage
text: I imagine Ray sort of descending into a childish whine in the last panel, hence "isself." I may be reading too much into it.
